page.title: 12CHANGING TIMES IN GREENFORD
page.content: We did a{survey of elderly people asking how their lives have changed.{ {In their homes}they said that modern technology means they have more appliances which make life more convenient. People had different comments on{clothes,}most said clothes were much more expensive than before and some said it was very hard to keep up with changing fashions. The people who did go to{work}worked less hours but said that the work was very hard. With{food}we found that most people liked take-aways and frozen food. They don't like preservatives; they prefer fresh foods. They say there is more variety of foods from other countries. We found that they think{people}are much more violent and rude. They say that there were a lot of friendly people before but now they are selfish. Sarita,Renu,Jasvinder L.
